content: Obesity, Diabetes, Gout, cholesterol, sugar, alcohol, milk, high-fat, beef, seafood, animal, proteins, chicken, fish, egg, vegetable
Obesity Patients should aim for less than 200 milligrams (mg) of cholesterol a day
Diabetes Patients should avoid high-fat dairy products and high sugary foods
Gout Patients should avoid red meats such as beef, seafood, and animal proteins which contribute to high blood levels of uric acid
Patients have multiple disease should avoid alcohol and consider to be vegetarian
